channel.title: Governance on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Governance on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Hakka.Finance (HAKKA) Logo
According to its official site, Hakka Finance places an emphasis on decentralized governance, because of how it transfers power to individuals.The products Hakka offers are BlackHoleSwap (BHS) and Third Floor Mutual (3F Mutual,) while Tokenized Collateralized Debt Positions (tCDP) and Crypto Structured Funds (CSF) have also been developed.The BlackHoleSwap is a decentralized AMM geared toward stablecoins. Lending protocols are integrated to leverage excess supply, and borrowing is utilized on the inadequate side.
You can download theHakkalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hakka
item.description: According to its official site, Hakka Finance places an emphasis on decentralized governance, because of how it transfers power to individuals.The products Hakka offers are BlackHoleSwap (BHS) and Third Floor Mutual (3F Mutual,) while Tokenized Collateralized Debt Positions (tCDP) and Crypto Structured Funds (CSF) have also been developed.The BlackHoleSwap is a decentralized AMM geared toward stablecoins. Lending protocols are integrated to leverage excess supply, and borrowing is utilized on the inadequate side.
